description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              ※ Ideal candidate
              
              ======================
              
              ◆Who can sympathize with the business content and vision of Lockon Vietnam.
              
              ◆Who can work with ambition, motivation, sense of responsibility.
              
              ◆Who are interested in new technologies and always think about how to apply into work.
              
              ◆Understanding the goal of product and doing well orientation to Team.
              
              ◆Flexible, energetic, patient and able to work within a multicultural environment.
              
              ◆Good common of English (Japanese is plus).
              
              ◆Understanding the right and obligation.
              
              Environment
              
              - Active, friendly, motivated and supportive colleagues (Teamwork is our pride.)
              
              - Challenging development with advanced technology.
              
              - Acquisition of the knowledge related to advanced online marketing.
              
              - Exciting experience to build the new company and the development team.
              

              ======================
              
              Technology and Tools
              
              ======================
              
              - Database: PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc.
              
              - Communication tool: Skype, Slack or TV conference system for video chat

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Work experience / Hard Skills
              
              ======================
              
              - More than 3 years of WORK EXPERIENCE as a developer.
              
              - Experience in Ecommerce, EC-CUBE is a BIG PLUS.
              
              - Experience in popular DBMS like PgSQL, MySQL.
              
              - Experience with tools : Jira, PhpStorm, Docker, Github, Bitbucket,...
              
              - Experience in reviewing work results of others (cross, mob review).
              
              - Understanding about software development processes ( Open source is a plus)
              
              - Have knowledges about software testing, Database analyzing and designing.
              

              ======================
              
              Competencies / Soft Skills
              
              ======================
              
              ◆Self study & control time.
              
              ◆Good sense of Teamwork.
              
              ◆Working with Scrum, Agile, Kanban.
              
              ◆Working under pressure ability and accomplish assigned task.
              
              ◆Want to be Bse.
              
              ◆Excellent communication, especially good in human relations.
              



              Benefits
              
              ======================
              
              - Yearly Award program and chance of going to Japan.
              
              - Monthly Team building event.
              
              - Company trip.
              
              - Club activity support.
              
              - Annual Health checkup.
              
              - Congratulatory or Condolence payments.
              
              - Tet gift, Mooncake, Birthday gift, Anniversary gift.
              

              Other information
              
              - 100% salary during probation period.
              
              - Twice salary revision in a year (April and October).
              
              - Basic Tet bonus (paid 2 times separately. 50% on July, 50% on January).
              
              - Insurance: SI, HI and UI as defined in the Labor law.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
